definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: In all tests video card and processor were cooled by liquid nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 在所有测试的显示卡和处理器被冷却的液态氮。

sentences.english: Summary of some of the following graphics card and associated fault for reference.
sentences.chinese: 下面总结一些显示卡和与之相关的故障供参考。

sentences.english: The display is by the monitor and display card two parts.
sentences.chinese: 显示器是由监视器与显示卡两部分组成的。

sentences.english: There was an error while initializing your video card.
sentences.chinese: 有错误，当初始化您的显示卡时。

sentences.english: The problem is with the main display adapter.
sentences.chinese: 这是主要显示卡所发生的问题。

sentences.english: Support for more graphics modes and cards.
sentences.chinese: 支持更多的显示模式和显示卡。

sentences.english: This category includes video display adapters, dot-matrix printers, and laser printers.
sentences.chinese: 这类包括视频显示卡，点阵式打印机和激光打印机。

definition: CD or DVD drive/abbr. to 光驅|光驱

pinyin: tong1 yong4 chuan4 xing2 zong3 xian4

definition: CD or DVD Drive/abbr. for 光盤驅動器|光盘驱动器
to replug/to disconnect and reconnect (from a plug, port, connection etc)
